info.name: FurAffinity - KISS Lite Theme
info.description:
"KEEP IT SIMPLE, STUPID" Lite Theme for Fur Affinity.
An easy on the eyes light theme for furaffinity.net with minimal color.
Also removes banner, ads and closes gap between navigation bar and main table.
AND removes shadows from thumbnails.
(New submission status icons are by yours truly.)

Optional - Want new Notification Icons too? Try out mines here! -
http://userstyles.org/styles/71952/furaffinity-monochrome-notification-icons
info.additionalInfo:
Optional - If you want the banners back, or revert thumbnails, you can edit the css and simply remove the lines between the comments.

submission icons are hosted on my DA gallery. If perchance they break, please notify me and I'll fix it.

*NEW* 
1.2 fix - Admin notice has proper colors.
1.1 fix - 'reply to' dropdown box had the wrong colors. whoops! fixed now.
